mapper.select: SELECT lane_code as 'laneCode', parkinglot_no as 'parkingLotNo', parking_level_code as 'parkingLevelCode', parking_zone_code as 'parkingZoneCode', lane_seq_num as 'laneSeqNum', lane_name as 'laneName', lane_type as 'laneType', manage_type as 'manageType', lane_status as 'laneStatus' FROM tbl_parkingLotUseInfo WHERE parkinglot_no = #{parkingAreaID}
SELECT pl_id as 'plId', rl_id as 'rlId' FROM tbl_parkingLot WHERE pl_id = #{parkingAreaID} LIMIT 1;

SELECT lane_code as 'laneCode'
FROM tbl_parkingLotUseInfo WHERE slot_id = #{plId} AND section_id = #{rlId}
